read.title: A Promised Land
read.author: Barrack Obama
read.comments: A must read. Gives a brief overview on the power dynamics both in the USA and globally.

read.title: Grokking Algorithms: An illustrated guide for programmers and other curious people
read.author: Aditya Y. Bhargava
read.comments: Good book for learning basic algorithms

read.title: Guide to Competitive Programming
read.author: Antti Laaksonen
read.comments: The best book on CP read thus far!

read.title: Sapiens, A Brief History of Humankind
read.author: Yuval Noah Harai

read.title: Algorithms
read.author: Sanjoy Dasgupta
read.comments: A little bit dry in the middle

read.title: Six Days of War
read.author: Michael Oren
read.comments: The detail to key people makes some parts hard to follow

read.title: Javascript for kids
read.author: Nick Morgan
read.comments: A fun book with plently of interesting projects! Highly recommended!

read.title: The Road to React
read.author: Robin Wieruch
read.comments: A good balance between depth and breadth

read.title: Introduction to Information Retrieval
read.author: Christopher D. Manning
read.comments: A good introduction to interved indexes and how information is efficiently stored.

reading.title: Introduction to Algorithms, 2nd Edition
reading.author: Thomas H. Cormen, Charles E. Leiserson, Ronald L. Rivest, and Clifford Stein
reading.comments: Highly touted as the 'Bible' of Algorithms
